projects.title: Artistic parfumery
projects.subtitle: 2023 - Morbegno, Italian Alps
projects.description:
This project transforms the space into an elegant theatrical setting, where fragrances and the owner take center stage. Soft, flowing curtains create scenic backdrops, shaping the environment with depth and movement.

A carefully designed interplay of lighting, materials, and textures enhances the experience, turning the perfumery into a place of discovery where every detail elevates the art of scent.

projects.title: Antica Osteria
projects.subtitle: 2024 - Canton Ticino, Swiss
projects.description:
Housed in a historic 17th-century building that has always been an osteria, this restaurant's renovation enhances its authentic spirit by celebrating history and materiality.
Dark oak paneling, divided by wooden and brass slats, improves acoustics while enveloping the space in warmth and elegance. Multi-arm chandeliers, set within the cross-vaulted ceilings, create a vibrant and inviting atmosphere.
Walnut tables and dark lacquered chairs recall the convivial soul of the osteria, while the wine display pays homage to the past: a demolished wall connects the two rooms, featuring a structure inspired by 18th-century ceiling hooks once used for drying tobacco.  
A project that blends memory and innovation, offering both loyal patrons and new guests a space where history comes to life with warmth and character.

projects.title: Law firm office
projects.subtitle: 2019 - Colico, Como Lake
projects.description:
Upon entering, clients are greeted by the impressive “Walnut Waterfall” counter, the central element that balances the space between the meeting room and private offices.  
/N Large glass partitions create seamless visual connections, while a striking blue bookcase unites the three rooms, enriched with custom-designed iron inserts. A project that combines elegance and functionality through refined materials and bespoke details.
